body:
Your program works just fine on windows:

```

C:\dev\src\a>type foo.go
package main

import (
        "fmt"
        "path/filepath"
)

func main() {
        fmt.Println(filepath.Dir(`D:\MyDocuments\3799\Defected House.zip`))
}

C:\dev\src\a>go run foo.go
D:\MyDocuments\3799

C:\dev\src\a>
```

path/filepath works differently on different OS, just like it says in the documentation:

```
Package filepath implements utility routines for manipulating filename paths in a way compatible with the target operating system-defined file paths.
```

Alex
